stimulusHtml: A second particle moves along the x-axis with position given by  x2(t) = t2 − t for 0 ≤  t  ≤  3.5. At what time t are the two particles moving with the same velocity?   -

features.html: A particle moves along the x-axis with velocity given by \(v\left(t\right)=\frac{10\sin\left(0.4t^2\right)}{t^2-t+3}\) for time 0 ≤ t ≤ 3.5. The particle is at position x = -5 at time t = 0.
